testcase.name: user verify the ALL menu
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to Amazon Home Page.........................................passed Then user clicks ALL menu...................................................passed And user selects "Electronics"..............................................passed Then user verifies that there are 17 subcategories..........................passed Then user verifies the title of all subcategories...........................passed

testcase.name: Amazon invalid sign in
testcase.system-out: When user goes to Amazon Home Page..........................................passed Then user clicks signin button..............................................passed And user enters invalid email...............................................passed And clicks continue button..................................................passed Then checks that the error message is displayed.............................passed
